title: Spiced pork with sweet potatoes
ingredients: ['1 tbsp sunflower oil', '4 pork loin steaks or boneless pork chops, about 140 g (5 oz) each, trimmed of fat', '1 red onion, coarsely chopped', '2 celery sticks, chopped', '1 large orange-fleshed sweet potato, about 400 g (14 oz), peeled and cut into sticks', '150 ml (5 fl oz) sweetened cranberry juice', '150 ml (5 fl oz) chicken stock, preferably home-made', '1 piece of preserved stem ginger, drained and cut into fine sticks', '1 tbsp thick-cut orange marmalade', '1 tbsp dry sherry', '1 tsp Chinese five-spice powder', '2 star anise', '4 plum tomatoes, quartered lengthways', 'salt and pepper', '3 spring onions, shredded, to garnish']
